title: Drawing, "Man with Telescope, for A Gas, Light and Coke Co.", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Figure wears a red hat and black-brown cape, holding a blue telescope to his eye. Figure shown on a grid in graphite, grid numbering in red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Man with Telescope, for A Gas, Light and Coke Co.", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-916.
